about_the_game:
Which do you choose, Noa or Meimei?

The two beautiful girls were engaged in a fierce battle.
Which one do you like the person you think of?
Thoughts are just as strong.
Then, which one is the "good woman"?
*Unlike the main story, this is a comical short story.

Special Story

You can enjoy the"if Story"unique to Special Story.
*You can play from the title screen.
Like the main story, it is a multi-ending type, and there is a little "bonus" after the END.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game include the following contents.
- Non-consensual sex
- Extreme play

detailed_description:
Which do you choose, Noa or Meimei?

The two beautiful girls were engaged in a fierce battle.
Which one do you like the person you think of?
Thoughts are just as strong.
Then, which one is the "good woman"?
*Unlike the main story, this is a comical short story.

Special Story

You can enjoy the"if Story"unique to Special Story.
*You can play from the title screen.
Like the main story, it is a multi-ending type, and there is a little "bonus" after the END.
name: SuccuSeka Special Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i Processor 1GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Sandy Bridge Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or other pointing device required. Operation in a virtual environment is not supported.

short_description: Enjoy the special story of “SuccuSeka: Resist Succubus Temptation”. After purchase, "Special Story" will be added to the title screen of the game.
